pageContent: Purpose: Recent work using prostate cancer mouse models implicated doublecortin (DCX)-expressing neural progenitor cells in prostate adenocarcinoma, reporting a strong association between DCX expression and histologic grade and clinical outcome. We sought to evaluate the relationship between DCX expression and these variables in human prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Diagnosis, staging, and risk stratification in prostate cancer: Utilizing diagnostic tools to avoid unnecessary therapies and side effects
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/28475407/
